title: Why even play Blind pick? - ROSSBOOMSOCKS

body: Just going to leave this here.

replies.body: Ross is like, Gold, yet plays like he's Bronze.

tell me about it

but it's not like I could do any better

He says all the reasons why blind pick is bad, trash talks people who play blind pick, I've seen it. Lucky bastards to have draft normals tbh.
